text: is a survival horror video game series and there is a movie based on the same title. The games are mostly about bad, evil or supernatural things that happen in the cursed town called Silent Hill and a specific person (i.e. the protagonist) whose gets trapped in it. The series is known for its grotesque monsters, especially Pyramid Head, and for its music. ==Games== There have been 8 main games and 4 spin-off games. There was also an HD Collection released with remastered ports of Silent Hill 2 and Silent Hill 3. A game titled Silent Hills was in development for the PlayStation 4, with video game designer Hideo Kojima (mostly known as the creator of the Metal Gear series) as the project's director. On April 27, 2015, it was confirmed by Konami that it had been cancelled. ===Main games=== *Silent Hill (1999) *Silent Hill 2 (2001) *Silent Hill 3 (2003) *Silent Hill 4 (2004) *Silent Hill: Origins (2007) *Silent Hill: Homecoming (2008) *Silent Hill: Shattered Memories (2009) *Silent Hill: Downpour (2012) ===Spin-offs=== *Silent Hill: The Escape (2007) *Silent Hill: The Arcade (2008) *Silent Hill: Orphan (2007) *Silent Hill: Book of Memories (2012) ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Psychological horror games Category:Video game series
